description:
Gather your friends to enjoy this fun quiz game. Show all your knowledge and memory skills. In addition, you will have a Nerd theme.

This game is full of laughter and knowledge, and is designed especially for families. Test your knowledge with question after question in 6 different categories. The player who answers the most questions correctly wins the game!

- 1 to 4 players
- Simple True or False answers
- Explore the different game modes and choose the one that suits you best.
- 6 themes available: Sports, Music, Culture, Movies & TV, Nerd Culture and Mental Agility.
- Match rounds of questions and compete against your opponents.
- Play with the whole family anywhere.

Do you dare to try?
name: Quiz 4 All
intro: Do you like Quiz games? Use your knowledge and challenge your friends to play this fun quiz game. Quiz 4 All is perfect for group fun!
